comment.author: 67214650@N02
comment._content: Campfires are a great way to share in community and build faith!  I love campfires!

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment.  I think Freud would agree with you (see _Civilization and Its Discontents_ for more details).  Mennonites do seem to love the outdoors, especially camping.  How many other Christian denominations have a camping association?!?!
